LanguageData.AC.FullOfFermentedCompost: Tried to add raw compost to barrel full of fermented compost. Colonists should take out the fermented compost first.
LanguageData.AC.OutOfTemp: Compost barrel out of ideal temperature:
LanguageData.AC.NotReady: Tried to get fertilizer but it's not yet ready.
LanguageData.AC.CommandAllowTillDesc: When enabled, colonists will till the land if it is not tilled or planted
